WorldModifierInfectionMutationIncubatesF.loc: $$InfectionMutationName$$: Swift Incubation: zombie infection escalates to stage 2 faster!

WorldModifierInfectionMutationLessCureDe.loc: $$InfectionMutationName$$: Resistant to Cure: zombie infection is harder to cure than usual!

WorldModifierInfectionMutationLessResist.loc: $$InfectionMutationName$$: Resistance: zombie resistance less effective than usual!

WorldModifierInfectionMutationMoreCarrie.loc: $$InfectionMutationName$$: Carriers: zombie infection creates more carriers than usual!

WorldModifierInfectionMutationMoreDamage.loc: $$InfectionMutationName$$: Deadlier: zombie infection does more damage than usual!

WorldModifierInfectionMutationMoreParasi.loc: $$InfectionMutationName$$: Parasites: zombie infection carriers spawn more parasites!

WorldModifierInfectionMutationMoreTownAt.loc: $$InfectionMutationName$$: Town Attacks: zombies attack towns more often!

WorldModifierInfectionMutationSpreadsEas.loc: $$InfectionMutationName$$: More Contagious: zombie infection is even more contagious!

WorldModifierInfestationDesc.loc: Infestation: This area is infested with little critters, increasing food prices.

WorldModifierInsanityDesc.loc: Insanity: This area seems to make people insane.

WorldModifierLargeMonstersDesc.loc: Large Monsters: There are lots of large monsters in this area.

WorldModifierLightningDesc.loc: Lightning: There are many lightning monsters and traps in the area.

WorldModifierLocksDesc.loc: Locks: This area tends to be locked up tight.

WorldModifierLostSoulsDesc.loc: Lost Souls: The area is haunted hy Ghosts, Death Knights, and Undead.

WorldModifierLowStressDesc.loc: Low Stress: This town will not have some of the more stressful quests like town attacks. However, you get 15% less XP.

WorldModifierMachinesDesc.loc: Machines: This area is known for its Machines!

WorldModifierMagicDesc.loc: Magic: Magic is much more powerful here! This attracts lots of mages!

WorldModifierMagicObjectsDesc.loc: Channeling: There are more magical objects here than normal!

WorldModifierMagmaDesc.loc: Magma: There must be a crack in the mantle below since there is a lot of magma.

WorldModifierManaPotionForagingBadDesc.loc: Bad Mana Foraging: This area has worse foraging for mana potion ingredients than normal.

WorldModifierManaPotionForagingDesc.loc: Good Mana Foraging: This area has better foraging for mana potion ingredients than normal.

WorldModifierMercenaryDesc.loc: Mercenaries: This area is known for its Mercenaries!

WorldModifierMightDesc.loc: Might: This area is a known gathering place for Warriors of all types!

WorldModifierMindDesc.loc: Mind: For some unknown reason intelligent evil gathers here.

WorldModifierMiseryTownDesc.loc: Misery Town: The people in this town tend to dwell on everyone"s problems.

WorldModifierMonsterTrapsDesc.loc: Monster Traps: The monsters in this area like to use more active traps.

WorldModifierMonstersDesc.loc: Monsters: There are more monsters in this area than normal.

WorldModifierMushroomsDesc.loc: Mushrooms: The area is fairly wet and is a good breeding ground for mushrooms.

WorldModifierNagaDesc.loc: Nagas: There are lots of nagas in this area.

WorldModifierNecromancyDesc.loc: Necromancy: Necromancers and Lichs are drawn to this area for some unknown reason.

WorldModifierNightmareDesc.loc: Nightmare: The monster respawn when it is night is much higher.

WorldModifierNoEventsDesc.loc: No Events: There are no random events in this scenario!

WorldModifierNoMonstersDesc.loc: No Monsters: There are no monsters in this scenario!

WorldModifierNoisyDesc.loc: Noisy: This area is noisier than usual.

WorldModifierNpcPaceDesc.loc: The NPC pacing option effects how often the NPCs choose to do activities.

WorldModifierObjectsDesc.loc: Clutter: There seems to be way more objects in the area.

WorldModifierOrcDesc.loc: Dark Orcs: Lots of Dark Orcs, beware.

WorldModifierOverrunDesc.loc: Overrun: There will be more monsters than usual, so it will be more challenging.

WorldModifierPaceDesc.loc:
The pacing option effects how fast quests advance and how fast monsters respawn.

Very Slow Pace: ^c00520% less XP^c145

Slow Pace: ^c00515% less XP^c145

Normal Pace: The normal pacing of the game.

Fast Pace: ^c00215% XP bonus^c145

Very Fast Pace: ^c00220% XP bonus^c145 and also starts with more quests

WorldModifierPayingTraitorsDesc.loc: Paying Traitors: Someone is paying traitors a lot of money.

WorldModifierPirateDesc.loc: Pirates: This area is known for its Pirates!

WorldModifierPitTrapsDesc.loc: Pit Traps: There are more pit traps than usual.

WorldModifierPlagueDesc.loc: Plague: There are many plague monsters in this area.

WorldModifierPlaguelordDesc.loc: Plaguelord: Plaguelords increase infections, famine issues, curses, and other bad things.

WorldModifierPoisonDesc.loc: Poison: This area is known for its Poison.

WorldModifierPoisonMistDesc.loc: Poison Mist: There is a constant poisonous mist in this area.

WorldModifierQuietDesc.loc: Quiet: This area is quieter than usual.

WorldModifierRageDesc.loc: Rage: Monsters are much more aggressive in this area than normal.

WorldModifierRagingHoardsDesc.loc: Raging Hordes: More monsters are running around than normal.\nThey are less powerful than normal though.

WorldModifierReligiousTownDesc.loc: Religious Town: The people here have more faith in Din than is usual.

WorldModifierReptilesDesc.loc: Reptiles: Reptile type of monsters congregate in this area.

WorldModifierRestDesc.loc: Rest: Healing is faster in this area.

WorldModifierRowdyDesc.loc: Rowdy: Fights are more likely to break out in town.

WorldModifierScavengerDesc.loc: Scavengers: There are lots of scavengers in this area.

WorldModifierScorpionDesc.loc: Scorpions: There are lots of scorpions in this area.

WorldModifierSecretChestsDesc.loc: Chests: This area has lots of chests!

WorldModifierSecretItemRarityDesc.loc: Luck: This area has higher rarity items!

WorldModifierSecretMiningDesc.loc: Mining: This area has lots of gold to be mined!

WorldModifierSecretMoneyDesc.loc: Money: This area has lots of copper, silver, and gold!

WorldModifierSecretMonsterRarityDesc.loc: Challenge: This area has higher rarity monsters!

WorldModifierSecretObeliskHeavenDesc.loc: Obelisk Heaven: This area has lots of obelisks!

WorldModifierSecretPirateDesc.loc: Pirate: This area has lots of copper, silver, and gold!

WorldModifierSecretTreasureDesc.loc: Treasure: The area is full of higher rarity chests!

WorldModifierSecretsDesc.loc: Secrets: This area is known for its secrets!

WorldModifierSeedyTownDesc.loc: Seedy Town: The people in this town are more likely to turn to crime.

WorldModifierShadowsDesc.loc: Shadows: Shadowy types of monsters like this area.

WorldModifierSizeDesc.loc: Changes the size of the area.

WorldModifierSlowNpcPaceDesc.loc: Slow NPC Pace: NPCs are less active than usual.

WorldModifierSlowPaceDesc.loc: Slow Pace: Quests advance and monsters respawn slower. However, you get 15% less XP.

WorldModifierSmugglerDesc.loc: Smugglers: This area is known for its Smugglers!

WorldModifierSocialTownDesc.loc: Social Town: The people here talk a lot.

WorldModifierSpidersDesc.loc: Spiders: The area is usually infested with spiders.

WorldModifierStormsDesc.loc: Storms: The surrounding area has a lot of bad weather.

WorldModifierTemporalFluxDesc.loc: Temporal Flux: More pockets of Temporal Flux than normal. Temporal Flux slow down any projectiles that moves through them.

WorldModifierThiefDesc.loc: Thieves: This area is known for its Thieves!

WorldModifierThievesDenDesc.loc: Thieves Den: A lot of stealing goes on in this town.

WorldModifierTorchesOffDesc.loc: Darkness: This area"s torches tend to be off.

WorldModifierTornadosDesc.loc: Tornado Alley: This area is prone to tornados.

WorldModifierTrappingBadDesc.loc: Bad Trapping: This area has worse trapping than normal.

WorldModifierTrappingDesc.loc: Good Trapping: This area has better trapping than normal.

WorldModifierTrapsDesc.loc: Traps: The monsters in this area love their traps.

WorldModifierTricksterRealmDesc.loc: Trickster Realm: Objects are locked and trapped more often.

WorldModifierUndeadDesc.loc: Undead: The undead love this area.

WorldModifierUnstableDesc.loc: Unstable: This area is very fragile.

WorldModifierVendorsDesc.loc: Vendors Galore: Wandering vendors really like this area.

WorldModifierVeryFastPaceDesc.loc: Very Fast Pace: Quests advance and monsters respawn much faster.\nThis mode also starts with more quests. You get a 20% XP bonus though.

WorldModifierVerySlowPaceDesc.loc: Very Slow Pace: Quests advance and monsters respawn much slower. However, you get 20% less XP.

WorldModifierVulnerableTownDesc.loc: Vulnerable Town: For whatever reason this town gets attacked more often than normal.

WorldModifierWarehouseDesc.loc: Warehouse: The monsters are pack rats or something.

WorldModifierWarsDesc.loc: Wars: The monsters go to war more often.

WorldModifierWishesDesc.loc: Wishes: This area is known for its Wishing Wells!

WorldModifierWitchDesc.loc: Witches: This area is known for its Witches!

WorldModifierWizardDesc.loc: Wizards: This area is known for its magic wielding renegades!

WorldModifierZombiesDesc.loc: Zombies: There are lots of zombies in this area.

WristsItemSlot.loc: EMPTY - put wrist armor pieces here

XAndYHaveEndedCeasefire.loc: The Ceasefire between ##1## and ##2## has ended!

XAndYHaveSignedCeasefire.loc: ##1## and ##2## have declared a temporary Ceasefire.

XChanceLevelYMonsterWillHitYou.loc: ##1## chance level ##2## monster will hit you

XCriticalHitBonusFromDefense.loc: ##1## defending critical hit bonus at level ##2##

XPaidYToBreakTreatyWithZ.loc: ##1## paid ##2## to break their treaty with ##3##.

XPaidYToGoToWarWithZ.loc: ##1## paid ##2## to go to war with ##3##.

XStartedFireInLevelYFromQuestAssassinFir.loc: The Pyromaniac ##1## started a fire in ##2##!

XStartedFireInLevelYFromQuestPillage.loc: ##1## town Pillagers started a fire in ##2##!

XStartedFireInLevelYFromQuestUniqueFireM.loc: The Arsonist ##1## started a fire in ##2##!

XStartedFireInLevelYFromTownAttack.loc: ##1## town attackers started a fire in ##2##!

XpBarHelpDesc.loc: This bar shows your experience gained towards the next level. There also might be a small notch that shows your current experience debt level.

YourCharacterHelpDesc.loc:
This is the character you control.

The bars above your character show your character"s main status.
^c002Green bar - health^c145
^c003Blue bar - mana^c145

ZealDesc.loc: An attack with extra damage, chance to get a crushing blow, and each hit leaves the victim weaker and weaker.

ZenSkillDesc.loc: A clear mind can channel and regenerate mana faster.

ZombieBombStage2Desc.loc:
On death, many Zombasite Parasites will explode out of the victim!

$$ZombieInfectionTip$$

ZombieCarrierStage2Desc.loc:
Will spawn Zombie Parasites, can no longer hurt zombies, but zombies will ignore you.

$$ZombieInfectionTip$$

ZombieExpertSkillDesc.loc: Increases all damage done to zombies.

ZombieInfectionTip.loc: Health potions have a chance to cure zombie infections.

ZombieKnowledgeDesc.loc: See all of the knowledge gathered about the zombies and zombies infection so far.

ZombieKnowledgeDesc1.loc: Zombie knowledge will unlock as you

ZombieThreatBarDesc.loc: Zombie Threat\nOutstanding zombie problems cause the zombie threat to increase. The higher the threat the more likely zombies will attack the town or cause some other new problem!

ZombiesAllowedDesc.loc: Turn this off if you want to play in a world without Zombies for a change.

ZoomDesc.loc:
This controls how far away the camera is from
the player. The farther to the right on
the slider the higher the camera will be
and the more you will be able to see.
